attachments.title: Federal Register | Operation and Certification of Small Unmanned Aircraft Systems
attachments.text: The FAA is amending its regulations to allow the operation of small unmanned aircraft systems in the National Airspace System. These changes address the operation of unmanned aircraft systems and certification of their remote pilots. This rule will also prohibit model aircraft from endangering...
attachments.fallback: Federal Register | Operation and Certification of Small Unmanned Aircraft Systems

text: I love this kind of stuff

"With Part 107, an operator with remote pilot certification can supervise an uncertified remote pilot as long as the supervisor maintains the ability to take immediate control of the sUAS in the event of a safety hazard."
Good news for teaching newbies. Also lowers the requirement to get literally everyone a drone certificate who wants to fly.
I think it look pretty good
